- Saturday, June 22 - Sunday, June 23 (2:00 PM EDT - 2:00 PM EDT)
- NARC Clubhouse

- Food & drink

## New this year

- Field/portable station at Jo Hays Vista
  - Sat 2p-5p; Sun 11p-2p
  - Either 1A (W3GA) or alternative transmitter (W3YA)
  - FM + linear satellite set-up?
  - Get on the air (GOTA) station?
- New logging software ([ACLog](https://www.n3fjp.com/aclog.html) by N3FJP)
- Inviting 2m and 70cm simplex QSOs from MS 150 operators or others in the valley.
